game_description: This game has been retired. It's a new type of first person shooter (FPS) game. You play as a gorilla. The locomotion is inspired by gorilla tag. You can run, jump, and shot using only your hands. This game is free, and you can play with other players.
review_1: This game is horrible I downloaded it to play the battle royale but it’s a gorilla soccer game and volley ball game this is horrible and I hate it in the place we’re my games are at it says gorilla royale but when I’m in the game there is not battle royale
review_2: I always played this game until the map you took out why did you take it out? It was so good, it had a warehouses, containers, and it was a large map too! And if the creator is reading this please bring it back and if you do I will rate this a five stars. Thank you
review_5: I like the game very much guys to make an a part two ￼
